trans-unit.source: Azure DocumentDB Linked Service
trans-unit.target: Azure DocumentDB Linked Service

trans-unit.source: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="6ebdea1d-fe37-4463-9dae-f40c2405df4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure DocumentDB Linked Service</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="6ebdea1d-fe37-4463-9dae-f40c2405df4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure DocumentDB Linked Service</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: Azure DocumentDB is a NoSQL document database service designed for modern mobile and web applications.
trans-unit.target: Azure DocumentDB is a NoSQL document database service designed for modern mobile and web applications.

trans-unit.source: DocumentDB delivers consistently fast reads and writes, schema flexibility, the ability to easily scale up and down on demand, and rich query capabilities using a SQL-like syntax.
trans-unit.target: DocumentDB delivers consistently fast reads and writes, schema flexibility, the ability to easily scale up and down on demand, and rich query capabilities using a SQL-like syntax.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure DocumentDB documentation</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/documentdb/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure DocumentDB documentation</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/documentdb/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You create an Azure DocumentDB linked service to link an Azure DocumentDB database to an Azure data factory.
trans-unit.target: You create an Azure DocumentDB linked service to link an Azure DocumentDB database to an Azure data factory.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes syntax for defining an <embeddedLabel>Azure DocumentDB</embeddedLabel> linked service in a JSON file.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes syntax for defining an <embeddedLabel>Azure DocumentDB</embeddedLabel> linked service in a JSON file.

trans-unit.source: When you use the Data Factory Editor in Azure Portal, the editor provides you a JSON template for defining a linked service that you can modify and deploy to create a linked service.
trans-unit.target: When you use the Data Factory Editor in Azure Portal, the editor provides you a JSON template for defining a linked service that you can modify and deploy to create a linked service.

trans-unit.source: To use the <externalLink><linkText>New-AzureDataFactoryLinkedService</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820246.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> cmdlet to create a linked service, you will need to create a JSON file and use it with the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To use the <externalLink><linkText>New-AzureDataFactoryLinkedService</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820246.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> cmdlet to create a linked service, you will need to create a JSON file and use it with the cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: This topic provides the latest JSON format that you can use to define an Azure DocumentDB linked service.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides the latest JSON format that you can use to define an Azure DocumentDB linked service.

trans-unit.source: When creating a dataset based on this linked service, you set the location type in the dataset JSON to: <link xlink:href="5606aefb-b5d3-49f0-b108-2ab3d0652e77#AzureDocumentDB" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">DocumentDbCollectionLocation</link>.
trans-unit.target: When creating a dataset based on this linked service, you set the location type in the dataset JSON to: <link xlink:href="5606aefb-b5d3-49f0-b108-2ab3d0652e77#AzureDocumentDB" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">DocumentDbCollectionLocation</link>.

trans-unit.source: When creating a pipeline, you set the source type to <link xlink:href="34d563cf-1163-47e5-96b8-9c7aec5f37d2#DocumentDbCollectionSource" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">DocumentDbCollectionSource</link> if you are using an Azure DocumentDB collection as a source in a copy operation.
trans-unit.target: When creating a pipeline, you set the source type to <link xlink:href="34d563cf-1163-47e5-96b8-9c7aec5f37d2#DocumentDbCollectionSource" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">DocumentDbCollectionSource</link> if you are using an Azure DocumentDB collection as a source in a copy operation.

trans-unit.source: You set the sink type to <link xlink:href="34d563cf-1163-47e5-96b8-9c7aec5f37d2#DocumentDBSink" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">DocumentDbCollectionSink</link> if you are using an Azure DocumentDB collection as a sink in the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: You set the sink type to <link xlink:href="34d563cf-1163-47e5-96b8-9c7aec5f37d2#DocumentDBSink" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">DocumentDbCollectionSink</link> if you are using an Azure DocumentDB collection as a sink in the copy operation.

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: Properties

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: type
trans-unit.target: type

trans-unit.source: The type property should be set to <embeddedLabel>DocumentDbLinkedService</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: The type property should be set to <embeddedLabel>DocumentDbLinkedService</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: connectionString
trans-unit.target: connectionString

trans-unit.source: Specify information needed to connect to Azure DocumentDB database.
trans-unit.target: Specify information needed to connect to Azure DocumentDB database.

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Example

trans-unit.source: You can get the endpoint URL (https://<docdb account name>.documents.azure.com:443/) and access key from <ui>Keys</ui> blade in the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: You can get the endpoint URL (https://<docdb account name>.documents.azure.com:443/) and access key from <ui>Keys</ui> blade in the Azure Portal.
